'''House Sarsfield''' is a [[noble house]] of [[the Westerlands]]. They are vassals to [[House Lannister]].
sections.In the books:
In the ''[[A Song of Ice and Fire]]'' novels, House Sarsfield is briefly mentioned and its only known members are:

*Ser Melwyn Sarsfield.
*{Unnamed squire} who accompanied [[Polliver]] and [[the Tickler]] when they encountered [[Arya Stark]] and [[Sandor Clegane|the Hound]] at the [[Inn at the Crossroads]]. Killed by Arya during the ensuing brawl.

They blazon their arms with a green arrow on white bend on green. Their words are "True to the Mark".
